doc:
Max Winkler (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Max_Winkler_(director) 0 Max Daniel Winkler (born August 18, 1983) is an American film director, screenwriter and television director. He is best known for directing the film Ceremony (2010), starring Michael Angarano and Uma Thurman. The film was Winkler's feature film directorial debut. Max_Daniel_Winkler ( born August_18_,_1983 ) is an_American_film_director , screenwriter_and_television_director . He is_best_known for directing the_film_Ceremony_(_2010_) , starring Michael_Angarano and Uma_Thurman . The_film was Winkler 's_feature_film_directorial_debut .
